mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TALK(TALK_ID, ARTICLE_ID, REPLY_ID,REPLY_CONTENT, OWNER_ID, OWNER_NAME, TARGET_ID, TARGET_NAME, CREATE_DATE, IS_DELETE) VALUES (#{TALK_ID},#{ARTICLE_ID},#{REPLY_ID},#{REPLY_CONTENT},#{OWNER_ID},#{OWNER_NAME},#{TARGET_ID},#{TARGET_NAME},#{CREATE_DATE},#{IS_DELETE})
mapper.select: SELECT T.*,USER_IMG FROM TALK T,USER U WHERE 1=1 AND T.REPLY_ID = #{replyId} AND T.OWNER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY T.CREATE_DATE DESC
